item.title: Can Hotels Afford to Upgrade Bandwidth?
item.description:
Hotels and motels face a challenge: guests love fast internet, but providing it is expensive. Upgrading bandwidth seems like the obvious solution, but it’s costly, especially since guests expect free Wi-Fi. While it seems logical that faster internet costs more, that’s not always true. Hotels can sometimes secure better internet speeds for less money. This depends on where they get their internet service and the age of their contracts. The internet landscape has changed rapidly...
